con:interface.name: Simple Banking API V2.0.0
con:interface.con:description: This is a simple Banking API V2.1

con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"This is a simple Banking API V2.1","version":"2.0.0","title":"Simple Banking API V2.0.0","contact":{"email":"you@your-company.com"},"license":{"name":"Apache 2.0","url":"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"}},"tags":[{"name":"admins","description":"Secured Admin-only calls"},{"name":"developers","description":"Operations available to regular developers"}],"paths":{"/accounts":{"get":{"tags":["developers"],"summary":"searches accounts","operationId":"searchaccounts","description":"By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for\navailable accounts in the system\n","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"query","name":"number_id","description":"pass an optional search string for looking up accounts","required":false,"type":"integer"},{"in":"query","name":"NumberId","description":"pass an optional search string for looking up accounts","required":false,"type":"integer"},{"in":"query","name":"skip","description":"number of records to skip for pagination","type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0},{"in":"query","name":"limit","description":"maximum number of records to return","type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0,"maximum":50}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"search results matching criteria","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountsItem"}}},"400":{"description":"bad input parameter"}}},"post":{"tags":["admins"],"summary":"adds an accounts item","operationId":"addaccounts","description":"Adds an item to the system","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"accountsItem","description":"accounts item to add","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountsItem"}}],"responses":{"201":{"description":"item created","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountsItem"}}},"400":{"description":"invalid input, object invalid"},"409":{"description":"an existing item already exists"}}}}},"definitions":{"AccountsItem":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","accountType","createdDate"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0851"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Joe Bloggs","pattern":"^(?!.{11})[\\p{L}\\p{Nd}]+(?:[- ][\\p{L}\\p{Nd}]+)?$"},"createdDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2016-08-29T09:12:33.001Z"},"accountType":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountType"}}},"AccountType":{"required":["name"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Personal"},"homePage":{"type":"string","format":"url","example":"https://www.personal-banking.com"},"phone":{"type":"string","example":"408-867-5309"}}}},"host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com","basePath":"/MConneely/Banking-API/2.0.0","schemes":["https"]}
